001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.log;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.utilities.logging.LogCore;
004
005/**
006 * Provides logging utilities for database-related operations.
007 *
008 * <p>This class serves as the centralized logger for database interactions, offering
009 * multiple log levels such as informational, warnings, debugging, validation, and step-based logging.
010 *
011 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
012 */
013public final class LogDb extends LogCore {
014
015   private static LogDb instance;
016
017   private LogDb() {
018      super("ROA.DB", "DB");
019   }
020
021   /**
022    * Logs an informational message.
023    *
024    * @param message The message to log.
025    * @param args    Optional arguments to format the message.
026    */
027   public static void info(String message, Object... args) {
028      getInstance().infoLog(message, args);
029   }
030
031   /**
032    * Logs a warning message.
033    *
034    * @param message The warning message.
035    * @param args    Optional arguments to format the message.
036    */
037   public static void warn(String message, Object... args) {
038      getInstance().warnLog(message, args);
039   }
040
041   /**
042    * Logs an error message.
043    *
044    * @param message The error message.
045    * @param args    Optional arguments to format the message.
046    */
047   public static void error(String message, Object... args) {
048      getInstance().errorLog(message, args);
049   }
050
051   /**
052    * Logs a debug message.
053    *
054    * @param message The debug message.
055    * @param args    Optional arguments to format the message.
056    */
057   public static void debug(String message, Object... args) {
058      getInstance().debugLog(message, args);
059   }
060
061   /**
062    * Logs a trace-level message.
063    *
064    * @param message The trace message.
065    * @param args    Optional arguments to format the message.
066    */
067   public static void trace(String message, Object... args) {
068      getInstance().traceLog(message, args);
069   }
070
071   /**
072    * Logs a step message to track database operations.
073    *
074    * @param message The step description.
075    * @param args    Optional arguments to format the message.
076    */
077   public static void step(String message, Object... args) {
078      getInstance().stepLog(message, args);
079   }
080
081   /**
082    * Logs a validation message for database assertions.
083    *
084    * @param message The validation message.
085    * @param args    Optional arguments to format the message.
086    */
087   public static void validation(String message, Object... args) {
088      getInstance().validationLog(message, args);
089   }
090
091   /**
092    * Logs extended details when debugging is enabled.
093    *
094    * @param message The extended log message.
095    * @param args    Optional arguments to format the message.
096    */
097   public static void extended(String message, Object... args) {
098      getInstance().extendedLog(message, args);
099   }
100
101   /**
102    * Extends the logging functionality using a custom log core instance.
103    *
104    * @param instance The custom log instance to extend.
105    * @param <T>      A subclass of {@link LogCore}.
106    */
107   public static <T extends LogCore> void extend(final T instance) {
108      LogDb.instance = (LogDb) instance;
109   }
110
111   /**
112    * Retrieves the singleton instance of {@code LogDb}.
113    *
114    * @return The singleton instance of {@code LogDb}.
115    */
116   private static LogDb getInstance() {
117      if (instance == null) {
118         instance = new LogDb();
119      }
120      return instance;
121   }
122
123}
